title: Reflections and Simulations
text: This is just a blog on random topics that I find interesting and have some thoughts on. This is also a way for me to get back into the habit of thinking harder and writing.

title: Welcome!
text: Welcome! This blog will cover Economics, Chess, Machine Learning, and occasional reflections on a host of other topics that interest me. Economics, Chess and ML are broadly the topics that I find most interesting currently, but that’s very much subject to change.

title: Welcome!
text:
Why I’m Writing
I’ve lately been feeling the urge to write, so I’m carving out time to put my thoughts down. Hopefully, this habit will last a while. I’m aiming to achieve a few things through this blog:

Thinking harder and deeper: Get back into learning and thinking harder about a topic
Leverage AI: Use this as an opportunity to get better at using AI tools for coding, research and writing.
Digital Minimalism: Divert attention from doomscrolling to something more productive and cathartic.







Note



This blog is built with Quarto, which allows me to mix code, prose, and math seamlessly.
